title: The Taboo Child: A New World
description: A fantasy progression litrpg. AunaLuna is a cursed child from a different world. Having lived over 2 Billion lives on Earth_7583 she is ready for a change. When the Gods offer thousands of souls the chance to enter a different worlds' rebirth cycle. She volunteers. This new world is full of magic, monsters, and crime, will she be able to finally live a happy and long life?
author: Blue Leprechaun
